title: FORCED-iNLAWS
description:
Release date: October 24, 2013
Genre : RPG (Rogue / Action) / 3D
Official site : Forcedthegame.com
Developer : BetaDwarf
Publisher : BetaDwarf
Language: English , German, Spanish , Portuguese, Swedish , Russian 
Sound language : English
Subtitle Language: English , German, Spanish , Portuguese, Swedish , Russian 
Localization : BetaDwarf
Version: 1.05
Publication Type : License


System requirements :
Operating system : Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2, or equal at 1.6GHz or better
RAM: 2 GB
Video Card : DirectX 9.0c-compatible, SM 3.0-compatible
Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
Space on your hard disk: 5 GB


Tablet: Not required

Description:
Forced - arcade shooter / RPG with puzzle elements and tactics , designed to play either alone or in co-op for up to four players. You - slaves who are sent to the most brutal of the gladiator school ever invented . You are destined to fight in gladiatorial combat , in order to finally win their freedom . You will encounter deadly trials and giant monsters , but Balfus , your Spiritual Guide will guide you on the path to recognition.
